title: Live Natural Chiropractic Center - Chiropractor in New Orleans, LA USA
description: Live Natural Chiropractic Center is your local Chiropractor in New Orleans serving all of your needs. Call us today at (985) 517-1404 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Welcome to Live Natural Chiropractic Center Your New Orleans Chiropractor Call us at (985) 517-1404 today. For more information or to schedule an appointment with our New Orleans chiropractor, call (985) 517-1404 today! Dr. Brittany Badon is a chiropractor serving New Orleans and the surrounding area. Our chiropractor at Live Natural Chiropractic Center is committed to providing chiropractic solutions to address your unique needs, whether you are experiencing back pain, neck pain, headaches, or even muscular tightness and tension. You may be searching for pain relief after an accident, experiencing an injury, or if you suffer from a specific condition like chronic back pain or a spinal condition. Even if you looking to improve your overall health, our chiropractor can help you attain your everyday wellness goals! Visit our testimonials page to find out what our patients are saying about our New Orleans chiropractor and our chiropractic care plans. Dr. Badon specializes in chiropractic care for the entire family. She has extensive training in chiropractic care for pregnant women and children. Chiropractic care has been linked to greater comfort and safer births. It can relieve and even prevent common discomforts in pregnancy, including low back pain, sciatica, mid back pain, headaches, carpal tunnel syndrome, and nausea. It can even balance a woman's pelvis throughout pregnancy, restoring and creating an environment for quicker, easier drug free birth. At your first visit to Live Natural Chiropractic Center, Dr. Brittany Badon will explain how chiropractic care works and give you a full evaluation to see if our chiropractic solutions are a good fit to address your needs. If there is a good fit, we can customize a plan of chiropractic care for your condition and health goals. If you have not been to a chiropractor before and want to find out more, please [email us](contact) or call (985) 517-1404 to receive the answers to your questions from our experienced team. We also welcome referrals, so we invite you to share our chiropractic and wellness information with your friends and loved ones. If you would like to stay informed about the latest in chiropractic care or if you want to start receiving free articles about health and wellness news, subscribe to our bi-weekly newsletter, even if you are not a patient. We also offer a member wellness area which includes our animated exercise videos, wellness articles, and other healthcare resources.
